WorkItem.Description:
Hello!
 
I have been using Rawr for quite some time now... but since the last release I have noticed a discrepancy on my hit cap.
Rawr is showing me at 16.06%, but when I tab back into game with the exact same gear on I am showing at 17.12%.
As such, it is making it difficult to prioritize my stats because it keeps telling me to reforge to hit when I am already capped.
 
 
Any help?
Was hoping for an answer before Firelands hits!
 
Thanks again!
 
~L

Comments.Message: Well armory also only shows you at 16% so I'm not sure why this is. I would suggest try looking through your gear one piece at a time, adding hit rating and compare with Rawr if you're able to see where the discrepancy comes from.

Sorry, I swapped out a new piece last night and my hit is actually 16.13%.
But now Rawr shows me at 15.06%, so there seems to be a 1.06% discrepancy no matter what my hit is currently at.

Lately the Armory has been bugging out on some players by not showing reforges that you actually have applied in game. Verify the Armory shows all the same reforgings and everything. If the armory is wrong, then Rawr will be wrong unless you manually correct it.
If you download your char from battlenet or the rawr addon, is there still a discrepancy?  If so, go over your gear one piece at a time to see if rawr got the stats wrong or missed a reforge.
